text: He is always anxious about ____(miss)the early bus.
analysis: "anxious about doing sth."为固定结构,介词about后需接动名词作宾语,意为"担心做某事",与"worried about doing"考点一致,故填missing。

text: She found a seat next ____ the fireplace, enjoying the warmth.
analysis: "next to"为固定介词短语搭配,意为"挨着；靠近",在此处作seat的后置定语,与真题考点一致,故填to。

text: A couple of days ____, I had been in another city, completely unaware of what was going to happen.
analysis: 句子描述过去某个时间之前发生的事,需用before或earlier表示"以前",注意不能用ago(用于从现在算起的过去),故填before/earlier。

text: For those who travel to the island, it's just a few hours away ____ boat.
analysis: 表示"乘坐某种交通工具"且交通工具前无冠词时,常用介词by,"by boat"意为"乘船",故填by。

text: We should try to finish our tasks on time and ____ the same time, ensure the quality.
analysis: "at the same time"为固定短语,意为"与此同时",用于连接两个并列动作,故填at。

text: His love for music goes back ____ his childhood when he first heard a piano.
analysis: "go back to"为固定搭配,意为"追溯到",此处指对音乐的热爱可追溯至童年,故填to。

text: Students should be more focused ____ their studies to achieve better grades.
analysis: "be focused on"为固定短语,意为"专注于",后接名词或动名词,此处表示专注于学习,故填on。

text: Take a break and walk around the garden ____ a while to relax your mind.
analysis: "for a while"为固定短语,意为"一会儿",表示动作持续的时间,故填for。

text: The new system was introduced ____ a way to improve efficiency.
analysis: as在此处表示"作为","introduced as a way"意为"作为一种方式被引入",故填as。

text: In some countries, people like to eat ____ chopsticks.
analysis: 表示"使用某种工具"时用介词with,"with chopsticks"意为"用筷子",故填with。

text: He commutes to and ____ work by subway every day.
analysis: "to and from"为固定搭配,意为"往返于",此处指上下班往返,故填from。

text: After graduation, she intends to pursue a degree ____ computer science.
analysis: 表示"某学科的学位"时用介词in,"a degree in computer science"意为"计算机科学学位",故填in。

text: The police are searching ____ the missing child in the forest.
analysis: "search for"为固定搭配,意为"寻找",此处指警察在森林中搜寻失踪儿童,故填for。

text: New techniques ____ detecting air pollution are being developed.
analysis: "techniques of/for doing sth."为固定表达,意为"做某事的技术/方法",故填of或for。

text: She was praised ____ helping her classmates with their studies.
analysis: praise sb. for (doing) sth.为固定结构,意为"因(做)某事表扬某人",此处用被动语态,故填for。

text: We were surrounded by a swarm ___ bees.
analysis: "a swarm of"为固定搭配,意为"一群",与"a pack of"(一群)类似,均表示数量群体,故填of。

text: He is considered one of the greatest inventors ___ the planet.
analysis: "on the planet"为固定表达,意为"在这个星球上",与"on earth"(在世上)意思相近,故填on。

text: Reading books can help you become informed ___ different cultures.
analysis: "become informed about"为固定搭配,意为"对……有所了解",与"become educated about"类似,故填about。

text: Due ___ the bad weather, the outdoor event was cancelled.
analysis: "due to"为固定搭配,意为"由于",后接名词或名词短语,用于解释原因,故填to。

text: There are diverse kinds ___ flowers in the garden.
analysis: "diverse kinds of"为固定搭配,意为"各种各样的",与"various types of"意思相同,故填of。

text: Try to reduce the influence ___ changing your diet suddenly.
analysis: 此处用"the influence of doing sth."结构,意为"做某事的影响",of后接动名词作宾语,与"the impact of"考点一致,故填of。

text: The factory is switching over ___ coal - fired energy to solar power.
analysis: "switch over from...to..."为固定搭配,意为"从……转换到……",描述转变过程,故填from。

text: From historical landmarks to modern skyscrapers, from local markets ___ luxury malls, this city has it all.
analysis: "from...to..."为固定搭配,用于列举不同范围的事物,意为"从……到……",故填to。

text: We should all take responsibility ___ protecting the environment.
analysis: "take responsibility for"为固定搭配,意为"对……负责",for后接动名词,此处表示对保护环境负责,故填for。

text: I like to chat ___ my friends about our hobbies.
analysis: "chat with sb."为固定搭配,意为"和某人聊天",与"speak with sb."类似,故填with。

text: This park is maintained ___ the public to enjoy.
analysis: for在此处表示"为了",说明公园维护的目的是让公众享用,构成"be maintained for sb."结构,故填for。

text: This building stands ___ a symbol of the city's development.
analysis: as表示"作为","stand as a symbol"意为"作为一个象征",描述建筑的意义,故填as。

text: His painting style is quite similar ___ that of Van Gogh.
analysis: "be similar to"为固定搭配,意为"与……相似",用于比较两者的相似性,故填to。

text: He is familiar ___ this song
analysis: "be familiar with"为固定短语,意为"熟悉……",整句翻译为"他熟悉这首歌"。

text: She is strict ___ herself in study
analysis: "be strict with"为固定短语,意为"对……严格",整句翻译为"她在学习上对自己很严格"。

text: I'm responsible ___ this project
analysis: "be responsible for"为固定短语,意为"对……负责",整句翻译为"我对这个项目负责"。

text: He is different ___ his brother in many ways
analysis: "be different from"为固定短语,意为"与……不同",整句翻译为"他在很多方面与他哥哥不同"。

text: The movie is based ___ a true story
analysis: "be based on"为固定短语,意为"基于……；以……为基础",整句翻译为"这部电影是基于一个真实故事改编的"。

text: She is busy ___ her work these days
analysis: "be busy with"为固定短语,意为"忙于……",整句翻译为"她这些天忙于工作"。

text: We should be kind ___ animals
analysis: "be kind to"为固定短语,意为"对……友好；善待……",整句翻译为"我们应该善待动物"。

text: He is similar ___ his father in appearance
analysis: "be similar to"为固定短语,意为"与……相似",整句翻译为"他在外貌上与他父亲相似"。

text: I'm satisfied ___ my present life
analysis: "be satisfied with"为固定短语,意为"对……满意",整句翻译为"我对我现在的生活很满意"。

text: She is afraid ___ being alone at night
analysis: "be afraid of"为固定短语,意为"害怕……",整句翻译为"她害怕晚上独自一人"。

text: He is fond ___ reading books in his free time
analysis: "be fond of"为固定短语,意为"喜欢……；爱好……",整句翻译为"他在空闲时间喜欢读书"。

text: We are proud ___ our great country
analysis: "be proud of"为固定短语,意为"为……感到骄傲",整句翻译为"我们为我们伟大的国家感到骄傲"。

text: She is good ___ solving problems
analysis: "be good at"为固定短语,意为"擅长……",整句翻译为"她擅长解决问题"。

text: He is interested ___ history
analysis: "be interested in"为固定短语,意为"对……感兴趣",整句翻译为"他对历史感兴趣"。

text: I'm tired ___ doing the same thing every day
analysis: "be tired of"为固定短语,意为"厌倦……",整句翻译为"我厌倦了每天做同样的事情"。

text: He is full ___ energy after a good rest
analysis: "be full of"为固定短语,意为"充满……",整句翻译为"充分休息后,他精力充沛"。

text: We should learn ___ each other
analysis: "learn from"为固定短语,意为"向……学习；从……中学习",整句翻译为"我们应该互相学习"。

text: The old man is famous ___ his paintings
analysis: "be famous for"为固定短语,意为"因……而出名",整句翻译为"这位老人因他的画作而出名"。

text: She is worried ___ her sick mother
analysis: "be worried about"为固定短语,意为"为……担心",整句翻译为"她为她生病的母亲担心"。

text: He is crazy ___ football
analysis: "be crazy about"为固定短语,意为"对……着迷；热衷于……",整句翻译为"他对足球很着迷"。

text: I'm used ___ getting up early
analysis: "be used to"为固定短语,意为"习惯于……",其中to是介词,后接名词或动名词,整句翻译为"我习惯早起"。

text: She is keen ___ traveling
analysis: "be keen on"为固定短语,意为"热衷于……；对……感兴趣",整句翻译为"她热衷于旅行"。
